name: Notion CRM Tracker
description: Checkout Notion for Agencies: The ULTIMATE all-in-one system for client-based businesses in Notion. Built to scale.⚡️ Road tested over 2+ years and by 50+ businesses ⚡️A simple CRM system with a built-in estimated value calculator, referral tracker and proposal creator. Closed deals are instantaneously turned into client projects and portals for the fulfilment team to begin work.INCLUDED: A ready-to-use template that makes the proposal writing process a flash. features: 2 x Comprehensive Loom Videos; Example data and internal support; Follow the Links to the Template; Duplicate the Template; A device to access Notion (e.g. Desktop, Laptop, Smartphone, Tablet); A Notion account (It’s free to sign up for a personal plan!); Basic understanding of how Notion works
